thread.title: F. Gary Gray all set to direct 'Fast and Furious 8'
thread.title_full: F. Gary Gray all set to direct 'Fast and Furious 8'

title: F. Gary Gray all set to direct 'Fast and Furious 8'
text: F. Gary Gray all set to direct 'Fast and Furious 8' Friday, 9 October 2015 (1 minute ago) *Washington D.C., Oct. 9 (ANI): 'Straight Outta Compton' director F. Gary Gray will be directing 'Fast and Furious 8,' it's official!* Washington D.C., Oct. 9 (ANI): 'Straight Outta Compton' director F. Gary Gray will be directing 'Fast and Furious 8,' it's official! The director took to twitter to make the announcement, saying "Can't ask for better partners than Vin, Neal and Universal. Excited to bring u the next chapter of the #FastFamily saga," E!Online reports. Vin Diesel had earlier given a hint about the director as he posted a picture on Facebook with Gray and a collage of photos from the Fast and Furious franchise. (ANI) Fast and Furious 8 Finds Director 01:07 ‘Fast & Furious 8’ has just found it’s director after a lot of speculation and even a suggestion that Vin Diesel himself will take the helm. New reports claim that ‘Straight Outta Compton’ director F. Gary Gray will get into the drivers seat for the next movie in the franchise. Recent related news "Straight Outta Compton" director F Gary Gray has revealed that he is set to helm the eighth installment of "Fast and Furious" movie series.
